text: oh for sure! gloomy days have me reaching for more coffee but its not all bad — perfect excuse to catch up on reading reports without feeling like im missing out haha gotta love being guilt-free indoors
crazy temp swings totally mess with everyone’s vibe here too!
honestly though sunny days make everything seem less daunting trabajo-wise
paychecks still don’t match "grown-up" feels lol
planning? more like improv class where no one graduates lol
wait till tax season hits you...
working odd public health hours has its perks for dodging traffic but geez does it throw a wrench in social plans - anyone relate?
public health ain't different - merit sometimes gets lost under who’s presenting 😪 gotta prove worth over & over again
